Story Squad

  • Project

    Story Squad is a creative story sharing platform for kids. I worked with real stakeholders to devise solutions within an actionable scope of 2 weeks.

  • Purpose and Goal

    Using an agile approach our team designed targeted solutions within an actionable scope of 2 weeks.

  • Lessons Learned
